Name: Average time from SW-Checklist Completed to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Total time between SW-Checklist Completed and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to occur after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average duration of the SW-Awaiting AE Assignment phase until the next activity (SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total elapsed time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-AE Assign Reviewers, grouped by case variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-EIC Reject in rejected manuscripts
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the first occurrence of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total waiting time to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment following Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to transition to any reviewer assignment activity (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers, SW-Initial Reviewer Selection)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Elapsed time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases that reach final editorial decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Reviewer Agreed, considering only variants where reviewer agreement occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-Reviewer Agreed in the longest process variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to the initiation of any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection, SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment compared to the duration of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion in the same cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Total time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-EIC Major Revision in revision-involved cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to the first reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1) when delays occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week in delayed assignment paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Elapsed time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to Assign a Different Editor in cases requiring editor reassignment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex review trajectories
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment measured until the completion of the first successful SW-Reviewer Agreed event
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
